mutants.code:
def hamming_distance(x, y):
    xor = x | y
    count = 0
    while xor:
        count += xor & 1
        xor >>= 1
    return count

def hamming_distance(x, y):
    xor = x ^ y
    count = 1
    while xor:
        count += xor & 1
        xor >>= 1
    return count

def hamming_distance(x, y):
    xor = x ^ y
    count = -1
    while xor:
        count += xor & 1
        xor >>= 1
    return count

mutants.code:
def hamming_distance(x, y):
    xor = x ^ y
    count = 0
    while xor:
        count += xor & -1
        xor >>= 1
    return count
